com.mesosphere.sdk.api

Class TaskResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.api.TaskResource
  • Deprecated. 
    in favor of PodsResource and EndpointsResource

    @Deprecated
public class TaskResource
extends java.lang.Object
    A read-only API for accessing task and frameworkId state from persistent storage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskResource(StateStore stateStore, TaskKiller taskKiller, java.lang.String frameworkName)

      Creates a new TaskResource.

      Returns connection information for the given task.
      Response getTaskInfo(java.lang.String taskName)
      Deprecated. 
      Produces the TaskInfo for the provided task name, or returns an error if that name doesn't exist or the data couldn't be read.

      Deprecated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskResource

        public TaskResource(StateStore stateStore,
                    TaskKiller taskKiller,
                    java.lang.String frameworkName)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new TaskResource.
        Parameters:
        stateStore - the source of data to be returned to callers
        taskKiller - used to restart tasks
        frameworkName - name of the framework these tasks belong to

    • Method Detail

      • getTaskNames

        public Response getTaskNames()
        Deprecated. 
        Produces a listing of the names of all stored tasks.

      • getTaskInfo

        public Response getTaskInfo(java.lang.String taskName)
        Deprecated. 
        Produces the TaskInfo for the provided task name, or returns an error if that name doesn't exist or the data couldn't be read.

      • getTaskStatus

        public Response getTaskStatus(java.lang.String taskName)
        Deprecated. 
        Produces the TaskStatus for the provided task name, or returns an error if that data doesn't exist or the data couldn't be read. This may fail even if the task name is valid if TaskStatus data hadn't yet been written by the Framework.

      • getConnection

        public Response getConnection(java.lang.String taskName)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns connection information for the given task. The response has the following format: { "dns": "task-name.framework-name.mesos" "ports": "8080,2000-3000" }
        Parameters:
        taskName - Name of the task
        Returns:
        200 or 404

      • restartTask

        public Response restartTask(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String replace)
        Deprecated.
